column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Two years ago was my first and only airplane flight .
#text=I was moving from the state of Kansas to the state of Washington , permanently .
#text=I had ordered my tickets three months in advance , with a little bit of hassle due to rescheduling -LRB- it was free , thankfully , -RRB- and met with my parents at the airport .

#text=After they wished me goodbye I took my luggage to the security area , got cleared ten minutes in advance , and waited for my plane , listening carefully for my number while I played my Nintendo DS .
#text=After that , we were all filed single line into my plane , and I took a seat - it was an open seated plane - and I waited to take off !
#text=It was super shaky due to turbulence but the flight was otherwise a very boring two hours - I fell asleep several times waiting for us to get there , and also ordered soda and a few snacks .
#text=I was allowed to play my games on the plane as long as it did n't use any wireless networks , but they got boring after a while .
#text=When I got off , I made sure to grab my carry-on and meet my ride to the new place at the Washington airport !
